title: I can't install the game... or can I?
body:
I can't install the game. As soon as i open then installer i get a error saying "Invalid Drive: E:\".
After 30 mins of researching, I think my problem is know as the "Error 1327". 

Short story: The drive E:\ is an old HDD of mine that mysteriously stoped working. Cant even see it in Windows->Computer. And now somehow that's causing trouble. 
What's the fix here guys?{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}} 

Thanks!

- Solrath

replies.body:
Hmmm, I've seen this a few times. When the installer shows your installation location, can you change it to the following directory:

>**C:\Riot Games\League of Legends**

Let me know if that resolves the installation error. ^.^
